title: Snowball (2021 Christmas event)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Snowballs were found during the 2021 Christmas event when building snowmen for Buoy and Gurl. A tiny snowball was placed on the ground when choosing the roll-snowball option on snow. Each time the snowball was rolled, it would move one tile forward and increase in size by 1 increment. Once the snowball had become a little snowball or larger, it could be picked up to obtain the item of corresponding size: little, small, normal, big, large, huge, or humongous, along with the message You pick up the snowball. The snowballs could then be placed on the scuffed snow piles to create a snowman.

SMW Subobject for LargeNPC location: FaladorUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: hist11238Examine: If I push this, it will get larger!Release date: 16 December 2021Image: File:Large snowball (NPC).pngIs members only: falseIs variant of: Snowball (2021 Christmas event)

Snowballs were found during the 2021 Christmas event when building snowmen for Buoy and Gurl. A tiny snowball was placed on the ground when choosing the roll-snowball option on snow. Each time the snowball was rolled, it would move one tile forward and increase in size by 1 increment. Once the snowball had become a little snowball or larger, it could be picked up to obtain the item of corresponding size: little, small, normal, big, large, huge, or humongous, along with the message You pick up the snowball. The snowballs could then be placed on the scuffed snow piles to create a snowman.

Snowballs could only be rolled inside Falador and attempts to roll the snow item outside Falador would cause the player to say "I don't want to roll my snowballs there, I should roll them in Falador!". Attempting to roll the snowball into an obstacle or outside Falador would cause the player to say "I can't roll the snowball that way!".

Placing a second snowball woulld cause any previous existing snowballs to disappear, with a message that said Your other snowball falls apart. Rolling the humongous snowball would cause it to break apart and disappear with the message You roll the snowball too large and it falls apart! Attempting to roll a snowball placed by a different player printed the message This isn't my snowball!

A snowball would disappear on its own if it hadn't moved for a few minutes.

'''Snowballs''' were found during the [[2021 Christmas event]] when building snowmen for [[Buoy]] and [[Gurl]]. A tiny snowball was placed on the ground when choosing the roll-snowball option on [[Snow (2021 Christmas event)|snow]]. Each time the snowball was rolled, it would move one tile forward and increase in size by 1 increment. Once the snowball had become a little snowball or larger, it could be picked up to obtain the item of corresponding size: [[Little snowball|little]], [[Small snowball|small]], [[Normal snowball|normal]], [[Big snowball|big]], [[Large snowball|large]], [[Huge snowball|huge]], or [[Humongous snowball|humongous]], along with the message {{RSFont|You pick up the snowball.}} The snowballs could then be placed on the [[scuffed snow]] piles to create a [[Snowman (2021 Christmas event)|snowman]].

Snowballs could only be rolled inside [[Falador]] and attempts to roll the snow item outside Falador would cause the player to say "''I don't want to roll my snowballs there, I should roll them in Falador!''". Attempting to roll the snowball into an obstacle or outside Falador would cause the player to say "''I can't roll the snowball that way!''".

Placing a second snowball woulld cause any previous existing snowballs to disappear, with a message that said {{RSFont|Your other snowball falls apart.|color=red}} Rolling the humongous snowball would cause it to break apart and disappear with the message {{RSFont|You roll the snowball too large and it falls apart!|color=red}} Attempting to roll a snowball placed by a different player printed the message {{RSFont|This isn't my snowball!}}

A snowball would disappear on its own if it hadn't moved for a few minutes.

{{2021 Christmas event}}
